alert.note: Alert for Clay; Cloud; Dickinson; Ottawa (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 06 at 9:33PM CDT by NWS Topeka
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Dickinson, northeastern Ottawa, Clay and southeastern Cloud Counties through 1030 PM CDT... At 932 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles east of Delphos to near Manchester. Movement was northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Clay Center, Wakefield, Miltonvale, Morganville, Green, Wells, Manchester, Longford, Aurora, Oak Hill, Talmage and Idana. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to ponding of water on roads. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
